CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( Train__c )), NOT( ISBLANK( Train__r.Carrier__c )), NOT(Train__r.Carrier__c == 'Purple')) , Train__r.Carrier__c, IF( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( Ticket__c )) ,NOT( TEXT( Ticket__r.Carrier__c ) == ''), NOT(TEXT(Ticket__r.Carrier__c) == 'Purple')) , TEXT(Ticket__r.Carrier__c), IF( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( Case__c )) ,NOT( TEXT( Case__r.Carrier__c ) == ''), NOT(TEXT(Case__r.Carrier__c) == 'Purple')) , TEXT(Case__r.Carrier__c), IF( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( CreatedById )) , NOT( TEXT( CreatedBy.Train_Service__c ) == ''), NOT(TEXT(CreatedBy.Train_Service__c ) == 'Purple')) , TEXT(CreatedBy.Train_Service__c ), 'Blue'))))
CustomField.label: Carrier
